Package Server

Interface AbaloneClientView

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbaloneClientTUI
public interface AbaloneClientView

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean getBoolean​(java.lang.String question)
    Prints the question and asks the user for a yes/no answer.
    int getInt​(java.lang.String question)
    Prints the question and asks the user to input an Integer.
    java.net.InetAddress getIp()
    Ask the user to input a valid IP.
    java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String question)
    Prints the question and asks the user to input a String.
    void handleUserInput​(java.lang.String input)
    Split the user input on a ":" and handle it accordingly.
    void printHelpMenu()
    Prints the help menu with available input options.
    void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Writes the given message to standard output.
    void startt()
    Asks for user input continuously and handles communication accordingly using the handleUserInput(String input) method.

  • Method Details

    • startt

      void startt() throws ServerUnavailableException, ExitProgram, java.io.IOException
      Asks for user input continuously and handles communication accordingly using the handleUserInput(String input) method. If an ExitProgram exception is thrown, stop asking for input, send an exit message to the server according to the protocol and close the connection.
      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException - in case of IO exceptions.
      java.io.IOException
      ExitProgram

    • handleUserInput

      void handleUserInput​(java.lang.String input) throws ExitProgram, ServerUnavailableException, java.io.IOException
      Split the user input on a ":" and handle it accordingly. - If the input is valid, take the corresponding action (for example, when "create:room:2" is called, send a createRoom()) - If the input is invalid, show a message to the user and print the help menu.
      Parameters:
      input - The user input.
      Throws:
      ExitProgram - When the user has indicated to exit the program.
      ServerUnavailableException - if an IO error occurs in taking the corresponding actions.
      java.io.IOException

    • showMessage

      void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Writes the given message to standard output.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to write to the standard output.

    • getIp

      java.net.InetAddress getIp() throws java.net.UnknownHostException
      Ask the user to input a valid IP. If it is not valid, show a message and ask again.
      Returns:
      a valid IP
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException

    • getString

      java.lang.String getString​(java.lang.String question)
      Prints the question and asks the user to input a String.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to show to the user
      Returns:
      The user input as a String

    • getInt

      int getInt​(java.lang.String question)
      Prints the question and asks the user to input an Integer.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to show to the user
      Returns:
      The written Integer.

    • getBoolean

      boolean getBoolean​(java.lang.String question)
      Prints the question and asks the user for a yes/no answer.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to show to the user
      Returns:
      The user input as boolean.

    • printHelpMenu

      void printHelpMenu()
      Prints the help menu with available input options.
